title: Problem-Based Simulation Course for Strengthening Organizational Change Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Non-real-time education conducted in a smartphone-based LMS environment, focusing on enhancing job applicability for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners identify three or more key obstacles to organizational change by analyzing change scenarios and develop response strategies.
Learners design change management processes using simulation tools and propose solutions to resolve stakeholder conflicts.
Learners can develop an organizational change implementation roadmap based on real-world cases and collaborate with team members to derive improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
